info.description: Simple Toolkit for Hangul ========================= base code forked from https://github.com/rhobot/Hangulpy í•œê¸€ ìëª¨ ë¶„í•´, ì¡°í•©(ì˜¤í† ë§ˆíƒ€), ì¡°ì‚¬ ë¶™ì´ê¸°, ì´ˆ/ì¤‘/ì¢… ë¶„í•´ì¡°í•©, í•œê¸€/í•œì/ì˜ë¬¸ ì—¬ë¶€ ì²´í¬ ë“±ì„ ì§€ì›í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ## INSTALL ``` pip install hgtk ``` ## Samples ### Letter #### Decompose character ```python >>> hgtk.letter.decompose('ê°') ('ã„±', 'ã…', 'ã…') ``` #### Compose character ```python >>> hgtk.letter.compose('ã„±', 'ã…', 'ã…') 'ê°' ``` ### Text #### Decompose text ```python >>> hgtk.text.decompose('í•™êµì¢…ì´ ë•¡ë•¡ë•¡! hello world 1234567890 ã…‹ã…‹!') 'ã…ã…ã„±á´¥ã„±ã…›á´¥ã…ˆã…—ã…‡á´¥ã…‡ã…£á´¥ ã„¸ã…ã…‡á´¥ã„¸ã…ã…‡á´¥ã„¸ã…ã…‡á´¥! hello world 1234567890 ã…‹á´¥ã…‹á´¥!' ``` ê¸°ë³¸ ì¡°í•© ì™„ë£Œ ê¸°í˜¸ëŠ” á´¥ì´ê³ , ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì´ compose_code ì˜µì…˜ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€ê²½ ê°€ëŠ¥í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ```python >>> hgtk.text.decompose('í•™êµì¢…ì´ ë•¡ë•¡ë•¡! hello world 1234567890 ã…‹ã…‹!', compose_code='/') 'ã…ã…ã„±/ã„±ã…›/ã…ˆã…—ã…‡/ã…‡ã…£/ã„¸ã…ã…‡/ã„¸ã…ã…‡/ã„¸ã…ã…‡/! hello world 1234567890 ã…‹/ã…‹/!' ``` ê¸°ë³¸ ì¡°í•©ê¸°í˜¸ì˜ ì˜ë¯¸ëŠ” ê³°ëŒì´ ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ğŸ‘‡ #### Compose text (Automata) ```python >>> hgtk.text.compose('ã…ã…ã„±á´¥ã„±ã…›á´¥ã…ˆã…—ã…‡á´¥ã…‡ã…£á´¥ ã„¸ã…ã…‡á´¥ã„¸ã…ã…‡á´¥ã„¸ã…ã…‡á´¥! hello world 1234567890 ã…‹á´¥ã…‹á´¥!') 'í•™êµì¢…ì´ ë•¡ë•¡ë•¡! hello world 1234567890 ã…‹ã…‹!' ``` ### Checker #### is hangul text ```python >>> hgtk.checker.is_hangul('í•œê¸€ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤') True >>> hgtk.checker.is_hangul('noí•œê¸€ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤') False >>> hgtk.checker.is_hangul('it is english') False ``` #### is hanja text ```python >>> hgtk.checker.is_hanja('å¤§éŸ“æ°‘åœ‹') True >>> hgtk.checker.is_hanja('å¤§í•œë¯¼êµ­') False >>> hgtk.checker.is_hanja('ëŒ€í•œë¯¼êµ­') False ``` #### is latin1 text ```python >>> hgtk.checker.is_latin1('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz') True >>> hgtk.checker.is_latin1('í•œê¸€latin1í•œ') False ```` #### has batchim ```python >>> hgtk.checker.has_batchim('í•œ') # 'í•œ' has batchim 'ã„´' True >>> hgtk.checker.has_batchim('í•˜') False ``` ### Josa #### EUN_NEUN - ì€/ëŠ” ```python >>> hgtk.josa.attach('í•˜ëŠ˜', hgtk.josa.EUN_NEUN) 'í•˜ëŠ˜ì€' >>> hgtk.josa.attach('ë°”ë‹¤', hgtk.josa.EUN_NEUN) 'ë°”ë‹¤ëŠ”' ``` #### I_GA - ì´/ê°€ ```python >>> hgtk.josa.attach('í•˜ëŠ˜', hgtk.josa.I_GA) 'í•˜ëŠ˜ì´' >>> hgtk.josa.attach('ë°”ë‹¤', hgtk.josa.I_GA) 'ë°”ë‹¤ê°€' ``` #### EUL_REUL - ì„/ë¥¼ ```python >>> hgtk.josa.attach('í•˜ëŠ˜', hgtk.josa.EUL_REUL) 'í•˜ëŠ˜ì„' >>> hgtk.josa.attach('ë°”ë‹¤', hgtk.josa.EUL_REUL) 'ë°”ë‹¤ë¥¼' ``` #### GWA_WA - ê³¼/ì™€ ```python >>> hgtk.josa.attach('í•˜ëŠ˜', hgtk.josa.GWA_WA) 'í•˜ëŠ˜ê³¼' >>> hgtk.josa.attach('ë°”ë‹¤', hgtk.josa.GWA_WA) 'ë°”ë‹¤ì™€' ``` #### IDA_DA - ì´ë‹¤/ë‹¤ ```python >>> hgtk.josa.attach('í•˜ëŠ˜', hgtk.josa.IDA_DA) 'í•˜ëŠ˜ì´ë‹¤' >>> hgtk.josa.attach('ë°”ë‹¤', hgtk.josa.IDA_DA) 'ë°”ë‹¤ë‹¤' ``` #### EURO_RO - ë¡œ/ìœ¼ë¡œ ```python >>> hgtk.josa.attach('í•˜ëŠ˜', hgtk.josa.EURO_RO) 'í•˜ëŠ˜ë¡œ' >>> hgtk.josa.attach('ë°”ë‹¤', hgtk.josa.EURO_RO) 'ë°”ë‹¤ë¡œ' >>> hgtk.josa.attach('íƒœì–‘', hgtk.josa.EURO_RO) 'íƒœì–‘ìœ¼ë¡œ' ``` #### RYUL_YUL - ìœ¨/ë¥  ```python >>> hgtk.josa.attach('ë°©ì–´', hgtk.josa.RYUL_YUL) 'ë°©ì–´ìœ¨' >>> hgtk.josa.attach('ê³µê²©', hgtk.josa.RYUL_YUL) 'ê³µê²©ë¥ ' >>> hgtk.josa.attach('ë°˜í™˜', hgtk.josa.RYUL_YUL) 'ë°˜í™˜ìœ¨' ``` ### Const * CHO: ì´ˆì„± ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ * JOONG: ì¤‘ì„± ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ * JONG: ì¢…ì„± ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸, ì¢…ì„±ì´ ì—†ëŠ” ê²½ìš°ë¥¼ ëŒ€ë¹„í•´ ê³µë°± ë¬¸ìê°€ ì¶”ê°€ë¨ * JAMO: ê³µë°±ì„ ì œì™¸í•œ ëª¨ë“  ìëª¨(ë¹„ì¡°í•©ë¬¸ì) * NUM_CHO: ì´ˆì„± ê°œìˆ˜ * NUM_JOONG: ì¤‘ì„± ê°œìˆ˜ * NUM_JONG: ì¢…ì„± ê°œìˆ˜ * FIRST_HANGUL_UNICODE: ìœ ë‹ˆì½”ë“œ ìƒì˜ í•œê¸€ ì½”ë“œ(ì¡°í•©ë¬¸ì) ì‹œì‘ ì‹œì  * LAST_HANGUL_UNICODE: ìœ ë‹ˆì½”ë“œ ìƒì˜ í•œê¸€ ì½”ë“œ(ì¡°í•©ë¬¸ì) ì¢…ë£Œ ì‹œì  ### Exception ì˜ˆì™¸ ì²˜ë¦¬ë¥¼ ìœ„í•œ Exceptionë“¤, ì˜ë¯¸ëŠ” ë³´ì´ëŠ” ëŒ€ë¡œ.. * NotHangulException * NotLetterException * NotWordException ##Tested in -
